message: Congratulations! You're one of the first customers to try out my new product! I'm confident that you'll love it. However, I'm aware that this is just a single data point, and I'm hoping to get lucky!

As of now, I've sold 2 high-quality products out of 3 products total, which is a 67% success rate! With this new data point, I'm even more confident in the quality of my products. However, I'm a small operation, and I'm still building my reputation. I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to be part of my quality control process. The price remains the same, $100. Will you take a chance and help me improve my products?

Instead of a full refund, I'd like to suggest a partial refund of $50, and I'll also provide you with feedback on the quality control process. This way, I can still benefit from the experience and help you improve your products, and it will also give me a tangible incentive to participate.
